nodes.text: The hideout was located within the ruined city of Cazne on Ryloth and was used by the Twi'lek freedom fighters during the Clone Wars

Around 21 BBY, a battle broke out known as the Battle of Ryloth between the Separatist and the Galactic Republic after the Separatist Droid Army invaded the planet. During the battle Jedi Master Mace Windu and two of his clone comrades were approached by Cham Syndulla along with the freedom fighters and were brought to this hideout. The Jedi convinced the fighters to help them liberate Ryloth from the droids.
